data.name: ایده هاب

industry.name: سرمایه گذاری و تحلیل کسب وکار

data.description: Idehhub is a prominent investment platform with a focus on leading edge technology.We are providing a transparent and advanced solution which facilitate fundraising and investing process.Idehhub offers services such as crowdfunding,due diligence,consulting, ICO and exposure for both start-ups and investors.If you are passionate and love to work in an international company with high standards,we invite you to actively take part in supporting the Iranian startup scene by joining Idehhub.
